doc.previous: January 10 1963 American Domina Jalbert filed a patent US Patent 3131894 on the Parafoil which had sectioned cells in an aerofoil shape an open leading edge and a closed trailing edge inflated by passage through the air the ram air design 8 The Sail Wing was developed further for recovery of NASA space capsules by David Barish Testing was done by using ridge lift 9 After tests on Hunter Mountain New York in September 1965 he went on to promote slope soaring as a summer activity for ski resorts apparently without great success 10 NASA originated the term paraglider in the early 1960s and paragliding was first used in the early 1970s to describe foot launching of gliding parachutes Although their use is mainly recreational unmanned paragliders have also been built for military applications e g Atair Insect
doc.after: The main application today of glider aircraft is sport and recreation
